data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

requestBody.title: Configure default hours and availability mode API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Data Residency Tenant Boundary. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.
